How did the gamemode go from "Fun and enjoyable with friends" to "The Most un-enjoyable toxic wasteland"? I loved when nexus blitz came out, it was fresh and fun. This patch it's when Me or someone else wants to play a champ that seems fun, we go against a super stacked 5 man running a perfect comp.

Some may say it's not like this every game, but it really is. People play the champs who can solo carry and dominate lane, regardless of fun, all 5 players spam emotes/taunts, screech in /all chat (even after muting they find another way to just make the game not fun and 1 game in; Nexus Blitz isn't fun anymore.

Even playing on a smurf, or main, nothing changes. This nexus blitz has problems with pacing, too. you can have a 15 kill lead, but nexus siege happens and that now 20 kill lead is nothing since 1 person made a wrong play. Bounties make comebacks way too easy.

Hope this never becomes a permanent in full opinion.

Next.
Exactly, the original was fresh and fun while still competitive and next to none of the original playerbase had a problem with it but riot decided to take it away to add their own "spice" to it.

*WHAT ABOUT SWORD OF THE OCCULT*

Awful changes. The alpha was 100000% better in my opinion. This is just another ARAM. In the alpha objectives were more spread out, so junglers could skirmish, while laners square off against one another. Now the buffs are packed right next to the lanes so its just a 5v5 fiesta the whole time. I wanted a quicker mode that had potential to use other strategies to win rather than just ramming heads over and over, and that is exactly what nexus blitz has become. Riot really screwed this mode up.

So I played this mode twice to try out, and it's awful for me.  I thought ARAMs were bad enough with not allowing fairness, but this mode has far too much damage.  The games are decided within the first few kills.  Which happen very early.  I get it, it's Nexus _Blitz,_ it's meant to be fast, but I didn't expect it to be as fast as it is.  Then, once game is decided, the team that's ahead wins every event, yet it still takes another ten minutes for the game to end.  I'm glad folks are having fun with it; it looked like fun from the outside; but it's 0% fun for me.  I hope I'm in the minority.
They managed to take all the fun out of the original nexus blitz
I completely agree
I _almost_ want to disagree. The problem being is that they wanted to balance, a mode not meant to be balanced. I do like the map design now.
Great improvement and brought my friend and me back to lol!

I didn't think they would make it worse, but they did. Arena is boring as you sit there for so long doing nothing. ARURF ruins the game if it happens first - whoever got the most champs to 6 auto-wins the event and the rest of the game. The other events are OK, but dull. A lot of people I play with don't even bother with them. The map has too many choke points - cc usually wins. It is a lot less fun than last time.

As a support main, I've always been interested in how supports do in other game modes. In new blitz, its trash. 

Now, this is meant to be a fast game, with stuff happening like crazy, but it seems to be a bruiser/assassin fest. I loved the new scuttle race. Didn't love the arena in 1v1. 

I'll play another 5 or so rounds before I start officially stating that only certain champs are viable. Hopefully that's not right.

I know the whole story around URF being on rotation was that people came back in droves for it and then trickled away just as quickly, implying the takeaway was "people get withdrawal from not being able to play URF in any of its blighted variations."
Yeah, I'm gonna have to side with Phryxia and Daeron and Squitter on this; I've actually had a lot **less** fun with Nexus Blitz for much the same reasons as URF: once you start the snowball rolling, there is just no coming back from it, or so little coming back from it that it's just a miserable experience to try and claw at it. And a "deliberately unbalanced" mode becomes a lot less fun when people "solve" it, and it really feels like a lot of people have started to "solve" Nexus Blitz like they did for URF.
I even have to say it, Nexus Blitz was actually the mode that not only killed itself for me, but dragged the rest of the game with it. It was just that miserable a time that I'm about done. Just wanted to explain why **this** player suddenly stopped playing, so that they don't think I'm having "withdrawal" from not getting to torture myself in that goddamn out of season April Fools Day mode again.
When will this event come back? I had sooo much fun playing this {{sticker:sg-janna}}

WTF is wrong with all of you people? IDC what any of you say, this game mode is fun. Mad props to RIOT for coming up with something original that has the ability to last longer than a week. This for me is more fun than Summoner's Rift. It's random, it has mini-games and appeals to my short attention span. I don't need to spend 30 minutes killing minions and testing the waters for well thought out team fights. The games are sometimes entirely one-sided and the team that wins everything still can manage to lose. It's consistent. It's everything that the community has bitched about NOT HAVING in years. You're seriously all impossible to please. Holy
